archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: [archi] jArchi Plugin
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: jArchi is a JavaScript-based scripting plug-in built on the [Nashorn](https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/articles/java/jf14-nashorn-2126515.html) engine. This means that the end-user can write code, or simple scripts, using JavaScript, and this is then translated into the underlying Java code that drives Archi.
